original_text: Throw away your gold things. Throw your pure gold among the rocks in the streams. Throw away your gold things. Throw your pure gold among the rocks in the streams. Throw away your gold things. Throw your pure gold among the rocks in the streams. Throw away your gold things. Throw your pure gold among the rocks in the streams. Throw away your gold things.
korean_text: 네 보화를 티끌로 여기고 오빌의 금을 계곡의 돌로 여기라

sentences.original_text: Throw your pure gold among the rocks in the streams.
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 순수한 금을 시내의 돌멩이들 사이에 던져라.

sentences.original_text: Throw your pure gold among the rocks in the streams.
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 순수한 금을 시내의 돌멩이들 사이에 던져라.
